ingredients.item: 200g Waitrose & Partners No.1 Red Choice Tomatoes
220g pack cooked Waitrose & Partners Extra Large King Prawns

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti in a large pan of boiling water according to pack instructions.

Meanwhile, use a coarse grater to grate the tomatoes into a mixing bowl (discarding any leftover skin). Stir in the finely grated garlic, oil, lemon juice and pinch of salt. Finally, stir in the prawns.
As soon as the pasta is ready, drain and tip into the mixing bowl, tossing it for a minute or so to soak up the sauce. Toss through the basil and serve immediately.
